short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See job post details from tutor messaging page and add increase and decrease buttons to price rate in job application details page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables a tutor view the original job post of a student from the messaging page, eliminating the need to navigate to the jobs page and then onto the applications page to find the details of the post the student made originally.

How it all works.
While on the messaging page click on the "Wzl Ready" button to turn it on, this will also show a line under the names of all the students which means you now view the original job post of the student.
To view the post, simply click on the student's name in the left panel and the job post information should appear in a moment to the right of the messages list.

Feat: add force submit button to bypass input rate step validation: 2023-02-22
